algorithm: The new algorithm calculates the score for each bin by subtracting the item size from the remaining capacity of the bins, then takes the reciprocal of the absolute value, and finally raises it to the power of 3. The scores are calculated for all bins simultaneously using numpy arrays.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    remaining_capacity = bins - item
    scores = 1 / np.abs(remaining_capacity)
    scores = np.power(scores, 3)
    scores = np.where(remaining_capacity >= item, np.full_like(scores, np.inf), scores)
    return scores
